properties.entry: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STATION_DATA ( id int IDENTITY, call varchar(16), name varchar(32), post varchar(16), addr varchar(64), mail varchar(32), uuid char(36), note clob, primary key(id) );
INSERT INTO STATION_DATA ( call, name, post, addr, mail, uuid, note ) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
DELETE FROM STATION_DATA WHERE call = ? AND name = ? AND post = ? AND addr = ? AND mail = ? AND uuid = ? AND note = ?;
SELECT call, name, post, addr, mail, uuid, note FROM STATION_DATA;
SELECT call, name, post, addr, mail, uuid, note FROM STATION_DATA WHERE call = ?;
SELECT call, name, post, addr, mail, uuid, note FROM STATION_DATA WHERE uuid = ?;
